actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to discourage interstate bootlegging of cigarettes by increasing the Federal tax on cigarettes and to provide certain repayments of such tax to States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an additional excise tax on cigarettes to be paid to States to the extent the taxes collected are attributable to those States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to discourage interstate bootlegging of cigarettes by increasing the Federal tax on cigarettes and to provide certain repayments of such tax to States.
